name: Spiderman - I Have No Home
description:
A budget spiderman game 

just some stupid game i made in like 10 days because why not, just started c# coding

wallrunning - just run on wall

crouch - left control

slide - v

run - left shift

hold right click is grapple where it pulls you toward an object

hold left click is swinging like spider man just swing

hold left click + a - left

hold left click + d - right

hold left click + w - forward

hold left click + s - unextend cable

hold left click + space - extend cable
